snippet: The first-ever design exhibition at the SoHo space spotlights an eccentric selection of functional and not-so-functional seating curated in homage to Ionesco’s play “The Chairs.”
abstract: The first-ever design exhibition at the SoHo space spotlights an eccentric selection of functional and not-so-functional seating curated in homage to Ionesco’s play “The Chairs.”

headline.main: At the Swiss Institute, a Survey of Eccentric Chair Designs
